channel.title: The Hack Hack (alpha build)
channel.description:
Hardboiled fantasy gaming, by way of *Macchiatto Monsters* and *Trophy*
---
#### Basics
- Standard six stats, 2D10K1 in order
- RUIN tracks from 1 (standard stress) to 6 (narratively fatal), a la **Cthulhu Dark**
- Start with LUCK resource at D8 and two other resources of your choice at D6 (such as "damned persistent" or "flirt for the crowd"); when rolled these decay on 1-3
- when outcome is in doubt, roll D12: =<STAT succeeds; =<RUIN complicates; >STAT failure (which also triggers **RUIN ROLL**)
- players may instead opt to roll a resource dice =<STAT rather than D12 (these decay to next lower dice type on 1-3)
- **RUIN ROLL** roll D6: >RUIN, increase RUIN by 1; at six, PC taken out of action
- when a resource decays, lower RUIN by 1 (minimum one)
#### Antagonists
- Foes described by HD#. They've a resource dice equal to twice their HD (min D4, max D12).
- Successful actions against foes triggers their resource dice to be rolled (decays on 1-3). If PC rolls =< foe HD, this roll also counts as a RUIN ROLL. Foes whose resource dice decay fully are at PC mercy.
- Unopposed enemy action causes automatic RUIN ROLL.
#### Cases
- PCs offered cases, with actionable outcome (Y/N) and reward of resource at D8 (either physical ("blunderbuss D8") or societal ("favour of Sondheim D8")
